welcome.description: Here you can ask about his experience, technical skills, leadership style, or anything else.

items.title: Technical profile
items.label: What are your technical strengths and how have you applied them?
items.prompt: What are your technical strengths and how have you applied them in your work?

items.title: Impact and results
items.label: Which achievements stand out and what impact did they have?
items.prompt: What have been your most relevant achievements and their measurable impact?

items.title: Leadership approach
items.label: How do you lead and support engineers’ growth?
items.prompt: What is your leadership style and how do you help engineers grow?

items.title: Next step
items.label: How do you see yourself in five years?
items.prompt: How do you see yourself in five years, and what motivates that next step?

composer.placeholder: Ask about my experience, leadership, or something else...
